long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make WhatsApp Better with Our Send Later Extension

Take control of your WhatsApp messages with our WhatsApp Send Later extension. Perfect for professionals and businesses, it allows you to schedule messages, stay organized, and manage your conversations more efficiently—without compromising on privacy.

Key Features:
Schedule WhatsApp Messages: Set messages to send at a specific date and time, ensuring you always stay ahead of your communications.
Custom Labels: Organize your chats by creating custom labels like "Family," "Friends," or "Work" for easy access and better management.
Filter by Label & Send:Easily filter your chats by label and send messages directly to the right group or individual.
View and Manage Scheduled Messages: Review your scheduled messages, reschedule, edit, or delete them as needed.

What We Offer:
- Privacy First: Your data stays with you. We do not collect, store, or share your chat data.  
- WhatsApp Compliance: We strictly adhere to WhatsApp’s terms of service, ensuring your experience is secure and reliable.

Perfect for Business & Personal Use!
Whether you’re a business owner wanting to stay organized or a personal user who values scheduling messages, this extension simplifies your WhatsApp experience.

Need Help?
For questions or feedback, contact us at dev@f22labs.com

Privacy Guaranteed:
Your data remains fully private with end-to-end encryption.
